name: DIVE (itch) (Frigid, Pcasella, Flowoop)
description:
This is a short game about exploring the area where your submarine has crashed, and locating your friends and lost parts of the submarine while keeping your oxygen replenished. This game was created as a group project for an Autumn quarter class in 2022.

Created by: Frigid, Flowoop, Pcasella

Flowoop's page: https://flowoop.itch.io/

Pcasella's page  https://pcasella.itch.io/

NOTE: I apologize in advance for the first minute of the game, I did the walking movement in like twenty minutes at 3am a few days before the project was due.
